casebody.data:
Mrs. Ruby D. BLAND, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Elliott L. RICHARDSON, Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare, Defendant-Appellee. No. 30790. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. June 21, 1971. *166Robert J. Lamb, III, William I. Aynes, Atlanta, Ga., for plaintiff-appellant. John W. Stokes, Jr., U. S. Atty., Atlanta, Ga., Kathryn H. Baldwin, Robert M. Feinson, Attys., Dept. of Justice, L. Patrick Gray, III, Asst. Atty. Gen., Washington, D. C., for defendant-appellee.

Before JOHN R. BROWN, Chief Judge, and GEWIN and MORGAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

See Richardson v. Perales, 402 U.S. 389, 91 S.Ct. 1420, 28 L.Ed.2d 842 [No. 108, May 3, 1971].

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir., 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
